Title: Increases the volunteer firefighters' and ambulance workers' credit
Summary: Relates to increasing the volunteer firefighters' and ambulance workers' credit; increases the amount of the credit from $200 to $500 for single filers and from $400 to $1,000 for spouses filing jointly.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to increasing the volunteer firefighters' and ambulance workers' credit
